thread.section_title: Intoxalock Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intoxalock | intoxalock.com | 14 of 218
thread.title: Toplica Nikolic

author: Toplica Nikolic
title: Toplica Nikolic
text: I was unfortunate enough to have to get an interlock on my vehicle for a DUI, but thanks to Jeffrey Peck at Intoxalock I was able to get a fair deal on the device. He even called around to find the cheapest service center to install and maintain the device. He never judged me because of my mistake like other interlock providers have. Jeff was very polite and professional, I'm happy to have met him and would recommend anyone to Jeffrey Peck at Intoxalock.
